title: Plan Types
content:

Plan Types

 

  • Plan Types
    • Filters
    • Creating a  Plan Type
    • Editing a Plan Type
    • Deleting a Plan Type
      • Field Description

Plan Types provides the details about the classification of the plan. It also specifies the calendar level at which the plan metrics are interfaced, like week/ month/year.

Multiple metric types can be associated with a plan type.

 

Note: Users have to create the Plan Type before interfacing the Plan.
Filters

The  plan  types filters are:

  • Business Calendar Level
  • Description
  • Plan Type Id

Creating a  Plan Type

To create a new plan type:

 

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Plan Configuration > Plan Types
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Click Create to view the Create New Plan Type window.
  4. Enter a Plan Type Identifier. 
  5. Enter the Description for plan metric type.
  6. Select the Business Calendar Level from the drop-down list. The selections are: 
  • Week
  • Month
  • Quarter
  • Year
  1. Click Save and Continue
  2. Click Create. The Create window opens.  Select the Plan Type Id from the drop-down list.
  3. Click Submit.
  4. Click Save and Finish.

Editing a Plan Type

To edit plan types:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Plan Configuration > Plan Types
  2. Enter the filter criteria and click Apply. You will see the records on the list pane.
  3. Select the required plan types record. Swipe-out the menu on the required record card and select Edit.
  4. In the Plan Type window, modify the required fields.
  5. Click Save to save the modified plan type details.

Edit View

  1. Select the required plan types record card. The action buttons are displayed in the footer section.
  2. Click Edit to view the Plan Type window to modify the required information.

Deleting a Plan Type

The plan types records can be deleted by following one of the below procedures:

 

Swipe-out List

  1. Select Menu > Configuration > Plan Configuration > Plan Types
  2. Swipe-out menu on the required record card and select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of plan types is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the plan types.

Delete

  1. Select the required record card. The footer section with action buttons is displayed.
  2. Select Delete.
  3. A confirmation pop-up prompts as 'Deletion of plan types is irreversible'.
  4. Click Yes to delete the plan types.
Field Description

Following are the field descriptions of the attributes available on the screen.

 

Field

 

Description

 
Plan Type  Id

The plan type identifier.

 

Business Calendar Level

The calendar level at which the plan metrics are interfaced.

Week/Month/Quater/Year

Description

 The description of the plan types.

 

Action Buttons

Following are the action buttons available on the screen.

 

Create Opens the Create New Plan Type window. 
Deselect Clears the selected records.
Edit Opens the relevant Plan Type window to modify the created records.
Delete Deletes the selected record.
